testsuite.name: CarSharingTest

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #6
After choosing '2. Create a company' item you should ask to enter a company name. Your output should contain 'Enter the company name:'
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test. Note that the '>' character indicates the beginning of the input line.
---
Arguments: -databaseFileName carsharing
stdout: 1. Log in as a manager 0. Exit > 1 1. Company list 2. Create a company 0. Back > 1 Choose a company: The company list is empty! > 2
